columnA.title: Fauda
columnA.description: A historical journey through the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, in collaboration with Netflix and their Israeli political thriller TV series, Fauda. In this React web application, I used inline SVGs and the Scrollama.js library to build an interactive map component and a performant scrollytelling experience.

columnA.title: To Pledge Allegiance
columnA.description: An immersive web experience showcasing a selection of audio stories from citizens affected by The Vietnam War, in partnership with PBS and Ken Burns' critically acclaimed documentary film series. I built a custom audio player, a countdown timer component using JavaScript ES6, jQuery, HTML5, and Sass.

columnB.title: The Possibility Report
columnB.description: An expansive multimedia hub of articles, infographics, and videos exploring how new technologies will reframe our understanding of the world. Built semantic, modular, and reusable components using JavaScript ES6, jQuery, and HTML/CSS using the BEM methodology.

columnB.title: How Can Cities Succeed in the 21st Century?
columnB.description: How WeWork is revolutionizing the future of work and impacting cultural change in the workplace and in cities. I built two interactives–a data visualization and infographic–using JavaScript ES6, inline SVGs, and Slick.js.

columnB.title: Designing for the Future
columnB.description: An interactive custom content piece exploring Volvo's human-centric design philosophy, presented by the all-new XC60, the “model taking the brand into the future.”

columnB.title: Behanced
columnB.description: A re-designed Behance clone built with React, axios, and the Adobe Behance API.
